meta_info.name: ADDRESSED_MESSAGE
meta_info.description: The concept of a message addressed to nominated recipients.

attributes.name: sender_reference
attributes.description: Identification of message used by sender. This will be the same no matter how many times this message is sent to these recipients.

attributes.name: addressees
attributes.description: Intended recipients, in the form of internet addresses.

attributes.name: urgency
attributes.description: Urgency with which destination should deal with message:
